name: x少女逃脱 x girl escape
name_original: x少女逃脱 x girl escape
description:
What Is This story?


escaping pursuit and surviving.

The pursuer in the game can observe your action and avoid shooting.
It's better to wear headphones to identify the direction of the enemy.

Shooting explosives, there is a chance to get resources, but there is also a chance to attract BOSS, to be extra careful, too close to the explosion will hurt blood.

How to Win?


There are two ways to win: 1. destroy all explosives; 2. destroy enough pursuers.

How to Buy clothes?


Stores: Use the resources available to exchange new clothes or unlock new dances.

Producer?


Game is made by one person, art processing, code writing, etc. Your support will be the driving force for local developers to update and create.

Start the Game, My Friend.


This game is FPS shooting game, can practice ballistic and pressure gun, easy to use.
